name: Webaverse
intro: Open-source operating system for the metaverse
introduce: Webaverse aims to be an open-source operating system for the metaverse, allowing users to build fully customisable and immersive worlds, games, and applications with no technical experience. Creators can drag-and-drop assets (images, 3D models, avatars, scripts) into the game in real-time to showcase and monetize their creations.
